1.content:
Victoria let out a quiet little yawn to herself as squirmed beneath the thin cover that clung across her damp body, her scruffy fur that's usually sticking out and unkept looking instead is dampened down with a thin layer of sweat. It was a cool summer morning but still she felt hot under the thin mattress, her dense fur more suited for colder climates than the one she resided in. It was an effective tool to encourage the 18 year old out of her bed in the morning though, anything to escape the heat she was enduring.

She didn't even bother to push off the covers, just rolling off to the side, dropping onto the floor with a dull thud, the husky lying on her front, wide rear left pressing up into the air. She was healthy in appearance, not overly thin, her fur bulking her up a little as well, but it was clear that under that fur she had wide child-bearing hips and a large bosom. She was totally naked, nights in the summer too hot for her to ever wear anything in bed, leaving the dog totally nude while she tries to awaken.

She grumbled out to herself as she pushes herself up onto her hands and knees before finally making the last struggle to get up onto her feet. She stood there, unsteady as she tried to awaken, only pulled from her daze when her alarm clock began to buzz on the nightstand beside her, the husky silencing it with a quick slap. She finally smiled to herself, her thick, bushy tail curling behind her rear and giving a few quick wiggles as she started to move finally towards the bathroom, humming happily to herself as she moved through the empty house. Her family gone for the week to visit her grandmother, giving her the total reign of her life, meaning she can finally have real fun. She was happy to be able to walk around the house naked, gathering herself up breakfast before moving to get a shower, all the while contemplating the day ahead and what she needed to do.

(Author's notes: Just throwing this out, if anyone wants any particular storyline here continued on or have any ideas for things they'd like to see written, give me a poke on here, always happy to hear from folks, hopefully I can tweak the story to your ideas or continue the storyline you wanted done! :D )

She at least knew her friend was working the same shift as her today, so hopefully she could kill a lot of time with her.

She pulls on a pair of plain white cotton panties and bra before grabbing her work uniform for the store, a soft salmon coloured cotton blouse and a rather tight fitting black skirt that reached to just above her knees. The skirt clung tightly over her wide hips and full ass, the dog grumbling out to herself as she shifts around in it, tugging down at the hem before just shaking her head and instead she just grabbed her three inch high heels and stepped into them.

She rushed out to grab the bus, not able to ever have passed her driving exam, so she had just resigned herself to taking the bus to her work each time. Victoria was about 6'7" in her heels, nearly two feet taller than the tiny mouse, and it was obviously taking its effect on the mousette, who was leaning back in near fear as she stared up into Vicky's face.

Abigail growled and walked off in a huff, leaving the laughing Miranda behind. Vicky was carried to the check-out counter where Vivian was standing. Vicky noticed that the female skunk looked a bit uneasy.

“H-hello there and welcome! Can I help you with something?” Vivian nervously asked, apparently intimidated by the large predator now looming over her.

Abigail was accustomed to being feared by others, in a way though it upset her. Just because she was an apex predator, and her bite pressure was comparable to having a small truck dropped on someone, people stood back. She was not a mean girl, and did not bite…much. Abigail chose to disregard the small mammal’s reaction.

“Yes, I wanted to try this on, but there’s no price tag.” Abigail explained.

Vicky saw this as a stroke of luck. Surely Vivian would know that underwear came prepackage and could not be opened or worn before buying, and she would inform the husky’s unaware captoress of such. Indeed Vivian did know this, but she was so afraid, and not wanting to upset the large gator decided to just go along with things, and let it slide.

“Uh, I-I can find the price for you.” Vivian nervously stammered as she hastily started searching through the catalog on the store’s computer.

“Ah, yes those are fourteen dollars.” The skunk spoke.

“May I try this on first?” Abigail asked.

“Vivian, no!” Vicky called, but again went unheard.

“Sure the dressing rooms are this way.” Vivian said as she gestured for Abby to follow. She led the alligator to the dressing booths and as Abby opened one she turned toward Vivian.

“Thank you.” She said kindly and then stepped inside.

“You are most welcome.” Vivian politely answered with a smile.

Abigail closed the door behind her, and Vivian leaned against a wall and breathed a relieved sigh. She then walked away towards Miranda to offer her assistance, the wolf was also intimidating, but the skunk handled canines better, one of her friends was one after all. Vivian then remembered that Vicky had not yet returned and wondered what was keeping her.

“Ah, somebody help me!” Vicky screamed as she was dropped on the bench inside the booth along with the alligator’s gym bag. Abigail of course could not hear her, as the transformed dog tried to move, but could not.

Abigail, still standing began to strip out of her tight denim shorts, the alligator growled in frustration as she struggled to get them off her wide hips. Vicky soon found herself looking up at the plump buttocks of the alligator that now stood with her back towards the former dog, naked from the waist down.

“Oh God,” Vicky said, started, “this isn’t happening.”

Vicky watched as Abigail studied herself in the body mirror. The reptile’s body was covered in forest green scales, while her lower jaw, the front of her neck, her breasts, belly, groin, and crotch, as well as the palms of her hands, the soles of her feet, and the underside of her tail were covered in smooth beige scales. She also had several rows of bony, plate-like ridges running vertically down her back and tail. Her skin appeared tough, but somehow soft at the same time. Vicky also noticed that the crocodilian’s finger and toenails were sharp and black.

Abigail had an thick athletic build, the muscles in her arms abs, and legs bulged, but only moderately so, suggesting that this alligator was physically powerful, yet her unmistakably female figure retained generous curves.

What really caught Vicky’s attention however was Abigail’s butt. The she-wolf was not exaggerating earlier. The thing was simply huge! It stuck out, and was so plump and round; one had to wonder how Abigail sat in chairs without breaking them. This was easily one of the largest rumps, if not the largest Vicky had ever seen.

“How does she find pants that fit?” Vicky thought as she looked on in awe. “There’s no way I’ll fit over that monster.”

Abigail turned around and snatched Vicky up with one hand. “No! Please!” The transformed dog screamed as she was suddenly lowered and the alligator raised a leg. Abigail put one bare foot into Vicky, and then the other. The poor former husky began to cry as she was pulled up Abigail’s long shapely legs. Vicky came to an abrupt halt when she neared the reptile’s thick thighs. Abigail let out an irritated growl, and started pulling at the thong, determined to make it fit.

“C’mon, dammit!” Abigail grunted as she struggled to squeeze into the skimpy, obviously too small lingerie.

Vicky meanwhile was in hell. She was stretched so much that she feared that she would rip apart. Each tug caused unbelievable pain for the living thong.

“Ow, give it up lady I won’t fit!” Vicky whimpered. The stubborn gator girl of course heard none of this and kept at it.

Slowly, inch by inch Vicky was pulled up Abigail’s meaty thighs until she bumped into the underside of Abigail’s enormous buttocks. Vicky was painfully stretched further as the alligator grunted and forced her bountiful bottom inside of Vicky, somehow she managed to hold together.

“Ew, ew, ew!” Vicky groaned as she was slowly dragged between two massive butt-cheeks.

“There!” Abigail triumphantly spoke as she finally completed her task. She turned her back to the mirror and raised her tail to get a better look. Vicky was now wedged deep in between the two biggest buttocks she had ever seen, totally swallowed up the giant gator’s ass. Except for the part of Vicky that formed the waistband, and the tiny bit of her that protruded from the top of the cleft of Abigail’s rear and from under her tail, from behind it looked as though the alligator was not wearing anything at all. The portion of Vicky that formed the crotch of her thong body was pulled flush against Abigail’s. Vicky could feel herself rubbing against the alligator’s moist labia, hugging the gator’s unmentionables as she gradually became a living camel toe for the reptile.

The pungent odor between Abigail’s hams was too much for Vicky to handle, and the living thong found herself grateful for no longer having a mouth because she would have surely vomited from the smell.

Abigail continued studying her rear in the mirror, and with one final pluck of the waistband she let the thong snap back into place. Finished her examinations, she lowered her tail, covering Vicky further. Abigail pulled on her short with as much difficulty as taking them off, and exited her booth to find Miranda standing outside.

“Well?” Miranda asked.

“Well, what?”Abigail asked in turn.

“How does it fit?” Miranda inquired, smirking.

Abigail paused for a moment and awkwardly looked away. “It’s…a little tight.” She said.

Miranda began laughing. “I bet.” She giggled.

“Don’t start.” Said Abigail.

“Are you going to buy it?” Miranda asked.

“Yeah.” Abigail answered after a moment of thought.

They made their way to the checkout counter where Abigail paid Vivian and informed the skunk that she’d be wearing her purchase out of the store.
122122222.title: A thong's eye view

choices: The effects of the transformation gun eventually wear off.
1221222221.content:
“So what do you want to do now?” Abigail asked.

“We were going to the beach, remember? Maybe checkout the guys.” Miranda answered.

The two females continued talking as they walked along down the street and poor Vicky was crushed and ground up between Abigail’s large buttocks. The wolf and alligator carried on. It became clear to Vicky that the two were good friends, roommates. Miranda seemed to be the brains and the leader, while Abigail acted as the brawn.

The two were close buds, but the alligator seemed almost afraid of the wolf. The she-wolf seemed nice enough, but there was something about Miranda that said “tread with caution”. Miranda and Abigail eventually reached the city’s waterfront and made their way from the boardwalk down to the beach where Miranda brought a hand to her stomach as it started growling.

“Hey, you find us a place to sit, I’m gonna change and find a snack bar.” The wolf spoke.

“Ooh, get me something too.” Replied Abigail.

“Yeah, right.” Miranda sarcastically answered.

“Aw, come on, Miranda, I bought the snacks the last time.” Abigail complained.

“Alright, alright you big glutton,” Miranda said with a chuckle, “I’ll get you something to eat.”

The pair then parted ways. Abigail began searching for a place to set up, but the beach was crowded today. She finally spotted some space between a female bobcat sleeping, wearing a one piece swimsuit as she laid on top a beach towel, resting on her belly, and a female coyote, wearing a bikini top and sarong with dark sunglasses as she read under a sun umbrella. They did not seem to be together, so Abigail approached the space between them. As she drew near, the coyote’s ears perked up. She looked up from her book and lowered her sunglasses. Her eye nearly bulged out of her head when she saw the tall alligator walking towards her.

By this time the bobcat had woken up and had also detected Abigail’s presence. The bobcat and coyote looked at each other, then to the space between them, and connected the dots. Without a word they hastily collected their things and then bolted off in opposite directions. Abigail just giggled as she watched them flee.

“More room for me.” She said with a smile.

Abigail dropped her gym bag and crouched down as she reached for the zipper. While she was squatting her gut let out a groan. Abigail suddenly passed gas, quite loudly. She paused for a moment, completely caught of guard, before laughing it off.

Vicky however was mortified. She was taught against Abigail s anus when she farted. The thong cried in anguish as she felt the alligator’s warm, putrid flatus absorb into her silk body. The earthy odor was awful, and Vicky’s acute sense of smell did not help.

Abigail pulled two beach towels out of her gym bag, and laid them out side by side on the white sand. She then took out a collapsible sun umbrella and plants it into the sand over the towel Miranda would be laying on. Being a reptile Abigail enjoyed sun bathing, and as such gave her smaller companion the umbrella.

Clothing was optional on this beach, many females were either partial or fully nude, and so Abigail slipped out of her crop-top, her impressive breasts bouncing as they were freed from the small, restraining T-shirt. She then removed her shorts, with slightly less trouble than before, though she chose to leave on her little thong. She placed her clothing in her bag, and then lay down on her towel.

A short while later Miranda returned wearing a red bikini, and her arms filled with food. The two shapely predators ate their fill and then settled down to watch a group of cute males that were tossing a football around.

Later Miranda started reading a novel, and Abigail was lying on her belly, her head resting on her crossed arms as she basked in the sun. She soon dozed off. Unable to hear Vicky’s pleads for help, and completely oblivious to her presence as she stewed in the gator’s ass. Miranda looked up from her paperback and glanced over at her large friend’s big behind. Abigail’s tail was to one side, and Miranda spotted the black T-back styled thong.

“Hmm…It looks kind of nice on her.” She thought, and then returned to her book.
1221222221.title: A thong's eye view--part 2

125.content: Other places for her to work?
125.title: Other choices

1251.content:
Vicky let out a sharp little whine to herself, glancing across towards the clock, she’d slept in, she was already late for her early shift of work at the hospital downtown. She sprinted into the bedroom, grabbing her uniform from the wardrobe, a simple pair of light blue scrubs for her top and bottom, an unflattering outfit for her body but she had never minded it much, except when she was trying to flirt with the doctors. She grabbed the nearest bra and panties to her before starting to move towards the front door, pulling on the underwear even as she walked. The panties and bra were the wrong type to be taking to work, her bright pink lace bra and panties, decorated along the hem with a few frills, less for comfort and more for showing off. Vicky pulled the scrubs on as well, before grabbing her hand bag and running out the front door to catch her bus.

------------------------

Vicky panted out loudly as she ran down the halls of the hospital, dodging past the various other nurses and patients that were walking around, even hearing a giggle from one of her friends as she ran, “Looks like someone’s late again!” Alecia called after her, the squat Jack Russell poking her tongue out towards Vicky as she ran past, Vicky just flashing a flustered smile in return. This was the fifth time this month that she had been late, her supervisor getting more annoyed at her each time it happened, she knew she was definitely going to be in the firing line today.

Her supervisor stood at the end of the hall at the reception area for the sixth floor, the miniature poodle leaning on the counter, looking over a piece of paper, glancing at the clock every once in awhile. Vicky sprinted right down to her, panting out loudly as she stops in front of the short poodle, offering up a weak smile. “Sorry I’m late Julie…Won’t happen again.”

Julie glared across towards her as she looked up from her piece of paper, turning out to be the work rota, her thin tail giving an annoyed little swipe. “Five times.” She growled out loudly towards Vicky, shaking her head slowly before she glanced down at the rota again. “I’m sick of this. You need a time out. Go down to section 8, they’re short staffed there. You’re going to be filling in for the next month down there. You should be thankful it isn’t more.”

What is section 8?
1251.title: Vicky works in a hospital

choices: She agreed with the way it was
12511.content:
Vicky blinked at that, ears giving a few curious little flicks as she peered back at her supervisor, but she just nodded, letting out an annoyed little rumble to herself. “Fine…” She turned and padded away, tail hanging low between her legs, ears flat on her head, she hadn’t been down to the Non-Canine section for months, it was considered a punishment for any canine to be made to work there. She hadn’t worried about it much at all those few times she was padding through it, but her friends had made it sound horrible. Aggressive patients, many of which were larger than the canines forced to work there, it was the reason why usually it was worked by only non-canines. These non-canine nurses and doctors were generally just as aggressive and hostile to the canines made to fill the spaces down there, paid far less, given more experimental or cheaper drugs to use on their patients. It was a split society and everyone knew it.

Vicky didn’t even know what she thought about the split society, between the canines and the rest of the species.
12511.title: Divided Society

choices: It's a slow, quiet day for all
There is an emergency in the canine section
125111.content:
Vicky hated the system as it was, her family had been sure to raise her without prejudice, she had been raised out in the country instead of in the busy city, where her family’s farm was sandwiched between a few dozen smaller ones run by felines, equines, even cows and sheep, and she’d spent many summers playing in the fields with the children. Life was different in the cities, non-canines were second class citizens compared to dogs, only allowed to hold lesser jobs, go to worse schools and treat their own kind, even if there were a shortage of canine doctors they weren’t allowed to help out. Vicky had no problem helping out, and if she was at home, she’d have jumped at the chance to enjoy time with the non-canines, but here in the city the non-canines hated the canines as much as they hated them.

Vicky stepped into the elevator, pushing the bottom for the second floor, the designated area for ‘Sector 8’, a single floor held for the non-canines while canines had nearly a dozen for themselves. Vicky rocked on her paws as she waited in the lift, trying to cheer herself up, she was sure if she gave out a friendly atmosphere the others would relax around her.

The doors slid open finally, and as soon as it was, a dozen non-canines, ranging from Felines to pigs all stopped to glance towards her, lowering their heads slightly before they continued on their way. Vicky just smiled, trying to look as friendly as possible as she padded out of the lift and took a right, heading down towards the reception area.

The reception was staffed by a looming horse, a Clydesdale, just like one of the families that owned a farm by hers. She padded right up to her, offering a bright smile as she held her hand up towards the near nine foot horse. “Hey there! I’m Vicky, I’ve been assigned to help you guys out for the next month!”

The horse glanced across towards her, frowning deeply, letting out a loud snort from her wide nostrils, blasting warm air over Vicky's face. She glanced down towards the offered hand before stuffing a file into it, “Get to work then, I’m sure you aren’t being paid to talk.” Vicky’s ears lowered at that, but she just nodded, taking the file before turning and walking off, trying to avoid the gazes being cast towards her from the other nurses.
125111.title: Vicky hated how society was

choices: A new patient comes in, seeming slightly suspicious
Vicky gets talking with one of the other nurses
1251112.content:
Vicky worked patiently throughout the day, trying to be as nice as possible, but she served very few today, it seeming like a really slow day. The non-canines were all on edge as well, even more so than they usually had been to the other nurses, they were quiet, distant, as if there minds were on entirely different things, no matter how nice Vicky tried to be towards them she was rarely even acknowledged.

She had just finished with one of her patients, a short mouse man, waiting at the reception area to pick up her next file when the TV set in the corner buzzed, changing from its boring soap opera to a breaking news report. The news was reporting an explosion in the counties nearby military base, a few miles from the city she was in right now. There were pictures of the canine base, military personal rushing around to try and put out the fires which looked like it had engulfed the armour yard. Vicky didn’t keep up with the news anymore, nothing was too interesting to her, but she had heard that there had been dozens of bombings in the past few months, all seeming to target military bases, taking out tanks and heavy armour mainly. Vicky knew what the result of that was going to be though, the canine section was going to get floated with injuries now, but she was still stuck in here.

Vicky was standing at the reception area, lent over the counter so she could poke casually through the waiting files, only two of them, and unfortunately both were marked ‘XL’, meaning they were very large patients so she wasn’t allowed to work on them for safety reasons. They were being kept for the elephant nurse that Vicky had seen around the hospital, so Vicky had nothing to do for now.
1251112.title: An attack on the canines

choices: She pushes it from her mind either way
12511121.content:
The doors of the elevator next to the reception area slid open with a low hum, and out stepped a snow leopard, standing at just around six feet tall. She was wearing a loose pair of cargoes and a loose, buttoned up blouse, but they seemed to clash with the footwear she wore, thick boots that seemed more designed for combat. She was clutching her arm, the right sleeve of her pink blouse blackened and slightly burnt, and Vicky immediately picked up the scent of petrol and smoke from her.

Vicky immediately felt the atmosphere change, several of the nurses freezing up around the reception area, fur standing up on end immediately, all of them staring across at the front of the leopard’s cargoes, a strange little symbol, a ‘C’ with two diagonal lines going from bottom left to top right. Vicky didn’t get why they were acting so strangely, so she just offered a bright smile across towards the leopardess, moving across to greet her. “Hey there, I’m Vicky! Want to follow me?”

The leopard was immediately taken back by this, tail poofing out slightly as her eyes narrowed at the dog infront of her, and suddenly a voice cut in, as one of the tigress nurses stepped up to the two. “No, its okay Vicky, go and get some rest, I’ll deal with this…” She said, lighting gripping Vicky by the arm and starting to try and lead her away, but Vicky shook her head and held her ground.

“It’s cool, Becka! I’ll look after her!” She offered a friendly smile towards the Tigress before waving the leopard towards a nearby treatment room. The leopard hesitated for a moment, staring at Vicky with her bright green eyes, before she finally padded into the room, rapidly followed by Vicky.

Vicky couldn’t help but notice the smell of petrol and smoke on the leopard, but it was strange, there were several other scents on her, bitter and rather potent, something she had never sniffed before. It was bizarre, and all she could think about was that bombing in the army base recently, could THIS be the terrorist?
12511121.title: A new patient comes in, seeming slightly suspic...

choices: She asks Vicky to meet her at 4PM on the roof
125111212.content:
Vicky smiles and shakes her head, she couldn’t believe a little cutie like this leopardess could do something like that and it wasn't her place to judge anyway, she was just here to help anyone who needed it. She padded up to the leopardess, who had taken a seat on the treatment bed, shifting uneasily as she hugged her burnt right arm against her breasts as she peered out towards the Husky.

“So! What happened, miss….?” Vicky said, noticing the leopard stiffening up at that question, but Vicky just offered a warm, caring smile across towards the feline, reaching out to put a hand on her left shoulder, tail giving a slow wag behind her rear. “Don’t worry, Miss, we all make mistakes sometimes. I even burnt myself with some cheese once! It stuck to my lip when I was eating a pizza.” She giggled, offering a smile again towards the feline, trying to get her just to relax around her, it was the only way she'd be able to treat her.

The feline just stared back though, seeming a little uneasy but she finally just nodded, lifting her arm up to let Vicky see it. “Shahir…there was a backsplash when I was fixing my car’s engine when it broke down…Think it as some oil or something....” She watched Vicky constantly with those wide, emerald eyes, as if seeing if the dog bought her story, but Vicky just smiled and nodded.

“I don’t even have a car! I couldn’t pass my driving test, didn’t like sitting still for all that time!” She giggled out loudly at that, reaching up to slowly peel back the blouse, leaving her arm exposed. Some of the fur was missing from the arm, the flesh on the exposed area bright red, but it wasn’t a bad burn. “There we go! Mmmm, looks pretty good to me.” She turned away from Shahir and padded across to the medicine cupboard on the wall, before digging through for a few long moments, a frown appearing on her face. She shook her head and stepped back, before offering another smile across towards Shahir, “Stay here, Miss, I’ll be back in just a second!”

Vicky disappeared out into the corridor at a flash, moving at a full sprint down the corridors, leaving Shahir alone in the room, but she wasn’t alone for long. Becka appeared at the door only a moment after the Husky disappeared, standing in the doorway with a scowl on her face. “You should get out of here Shahir! Where do you think she’s running too? Probably to get security! You can’t get captured here, not now..” The large tigress growled out, but Shahir just tilted her head across towards her.

“I don’t think she even noticed Becka, you worry too much about the canines. I doubt she was even paying enough attention to me to realise.” The leopardess sniffed down towards her own arm, easily detecting the scent of the explosives, but she still doubted the dog had even paid attention to her to work it out. “Hang around though.” Becka nodded and stepped out into the corridor again, barely a few seconds before Vicky appeared again, but there were no security guards with her, and her face was a picture of happiness and beauty, showing a bright smile across towards the leopardess.

Shahir seemed even more concerned about the dog’s joy, none she met had ever seemed to happy to be at work, especially not a dog being punished. She felt the weight of her knife in the thigh pocket of her cargoes, knowing it was there if she needed it, but it was quickly revealed that she didn’t need it. Vicky held out a small tube towards the feline, written on it was ‘Xervenen, Canine’. It was burn ointment, but it was for canines, the more expensive, far better brand, kept back only for dogs while the Non-Canines were forced to take cheap, ineffective products.

“Uh…that’s a dog one.” Shahir said, pointing across towards it, just assuming the dog had probably missed that or couldn’t read well enough, she had known some very stupid dogs working in places while non-canines who were far smarter were banned.

“Mmmm, so? You need it, sure the boss wouldn’t argue with that! Anything to make people feel better!” She smiled, a polite little smile as she reached out to hand it to Shahir before handing her a roll of bandages as well. “Take a shower, then apply it and bandage it up! Only a few days and it’ll be all cleaned up.”

Shahir just didn’t know what to say, canines were never nice to cats, never had any even smiled at her since she was born in the depth of this city’s ‘ghetto’, but Vicky had quite happily broken the rules just to help her out. She felt a warm blush spread across her cheeks before offering up a smile towards Vicky, “Thank you…..thanks so much.”

Vicky giggled at that, leaning in to give her a wet lick on the nose, something she often had done to many patients and friends, nothing sexual in it to the dog, it was simply a friendly act to her. She waved a paw towards the door, not even noticing that Becka was watching through a slight gap in the doorway. “Its no problem at all! I hope you have fun at the festival today!”

Shahir blinked at that, beginning to stand up from the bed, her face nearly bright crimson beneath the white fur of her face, the blush growing deeper. “You know about the festival? Didn’t think any of you dogs even knew about our celebrations…especially one to do with celebrating our…well….’non-doggyness’.” She let out a giggle at her own phrase, smiling towards the Husky.

“Oh! I even celebrated it once!” She giggles at the memory, tail wagging, “When I used to live in the country…mmm….” She rumbled out to herself, tail wagging behind her rear. “Wow was that a wild few days….” She was blushing herself, but quickly shook her had. “Bah! Anyway! I’m gonna be here for the rest of the day, even if this bits closing down, I’ll probably be back in the canine section or somewhere else. So if you need anymore help at all, I’ll be here. Just ask for Vicky Mason!”

Shahir smiled and nodded, moving towards the door, “I’ll do that…thanks for the help Vicky, was nice to meet you.” She stopped at the door, holding it open as she just stood in the doorway, spotting Becka a few feet down the corridor.
125111212.title: Vicky ignores the evidence

choices: Vicky says no, she doesn't date non-canines
1251112122.content: Shahir turns back around, large, floofy tail giving a few swishes behind her rump as she peered across towards Vicky for a few long seconds. A smile spread across her face finally, and she moved back to stand right in front of Vicky again, letting out a quiet, happy little ‘meow’ towards her. “Uhh…I’d like to meet you…on the roof here today…at 4PM.” Her blush was getting obvious to Vicky now even, she was embarrassed about this obviously. “Could be cool to meet up and talk……and heck, I’d like to hear about that time you were at the festival…..maybe I could even take you to our festival…..or something…”
1251112122.title: She wants to meet Vicky again

choices: Nothing of real interest happens for awhile
She gets the attention of other non-canines now because of how nice she is
12511121221.content:
Vicky smiled in return towards the leopardess and rapidly nodded as she looked down at the shorter feline, leaning in to give her a lick on the nose again. “Definitely! I promise I’ll see you up there! And mmm….maybe I’ll tell you the story….gets kinda dirty though!” She giggles at that, the giggle quickly getting matched by Shahir's, who’s bright eyes stayed locked with Vicky's. She nodded before turning and padding out quickly, not even looking towards Becka as she just headed off home with the expensive ointment. Becka glared after her, before shooting a glare towards Vicky as she passed the doorway on her way back to the reception area, letting out a short, quick hiss.

Vicky took little notice, she just padded out and went back to work, though her tail was surely wagging a lot more, she liked meeting friendly people.
12511121221.title: Vicky happily agrees

choices: A very fat/large patient has just entered the ward
125111212211.content:
Vicky’s day was simple, passing by quickly, only treating a few more patients before it reached 1PM and the Non-canine area closed down, this the only time of the year when they got to enjoy a official holiday. For the next three days work would end early for all of them in the city and they’d be back in their ghetto for mass parties. Canines never got to experience the festivals, usually it was far too dangerous for them to enter the ghettos but none seemed even interested in it. Sometimes a camera crew would beam out images of the festivals, but it was usually in a form to insult the felines and their ways. Vicky knew it was different though, she had gone to a small one out in the country where she lived, she'd even dyed her fur to take on a less canine appearance. It was simply a way for non-canines to keep their cultures intact, so in the mass parties they often celebrated small aspects of each different race that made up the huge communities.

With Sector 8 closed she was sent to reception to help file people away and get them appointments, a far worse punishment for her than her time in Sector 8, too boring as she was just left sitting still for hours on end. At 3PM though she was able to get a short break, the dog able to stretch out in the rest room while watching a mindless soap on the TV, barely able to even keep awake during it.

Vicky had nearly slipped off to sleep when suddenly the ground seemed to shake beneath her, the dog letting out a startled little yelp as she slipped off the edge of the couch to land on her rear in front of the TV. She blinked, surprised at that, but eventually just giggled to herself, putting it down to her own stupidity, but it was because of something else.
125111212211.title: Sudden rumble

1251112122112.content:
There was another rumble though, and then another, certainly not her just being clumsy then, it instead was something much more. Attention was pulled in from the rest of the hospital as several doctors and nurses rushed into the room with Vicky, passing right by her to the South-facing window. A nurse appeared beside Vicky, snatching up the TV remote from where Vicky had been sitting on the couch, beginning to frantically flash through the channels.

Vicky glanced across to the crowd gathering at the window, hearing gasps and whimpers of fear, beginning to straighten up and move towards the window. The nurse seemed to finally find the channel she was looking for, the news, where the news anchor, a busty poodle girl was growling towards someone off screen.

“Its just an earthquake, Danny. Jeez, stop being such an idiot.” The anchorwoman said, folding her arms over her large tits, glaring off towards whoever she was talking too. “A giant? Are you an idiot, I’m not going on live and saying there’s a fucking giant in the city without actual confirmation.” She rolled her eyes at that, turning to look towards the camera, ears seeming to flick as she noticed it was recording before she quickly plastered on her fake smile.

Vicky watched, a confused look on her face, she didn’t believe what she was hearing, there was no way what they were saying was true, especially now that her favourite anchor woman, ’Jennifer La Bon’ had said so. She lived out in the suburbs of the city, her family’s house one of dozens like it in the long row of houses, a great spot for her, close to her job, her school and her favourite park. It had been one of the few reasons why she had never learnt to drive, along with her lack of concentration when just sitting around in a car when she’d rather be running.

It didn’t take long for her to reach the park, the dog passing several other joggers as she kept at a near sprint for as long as possible. Her maw hung open as she ran, tongue hanging out the side as she panted loudly into the cool morning air, feeling the breeze ruffling through her dense fur as she just ran for as long as she possibly could. She began to slow eventually as she closed near the centre of the park where the crowds were the thickest, but also where she could grab a quick drink from one of the water fountains before she continued on with her run. She slowed right next to the large water fountain that marked the centre of the park, dozens of other furs of all ages standing around it, chatting with each other or just enjoying the day. She passed over to one of the small water fountains by the edge of the clearing and leant in to take a long drink, letting the cold water cool her.

She straightened up slowly, letting out a happy growl to herself as she just looked around, seeing who all was around today.

Suddenly, there is a bright flash of light!

Vicky blinks several times and looks around...
13232.title: "This is, like, a totally awesome ring!"

choices: Continue to tamper with the ring.
132321.content:
At first, all Vicky could see was a horrendously blurred rendition of the park, her sense of vision doing little to help her realize exactly what had just occurred. She did, however, realize she was now standing, something that understandably struck her as odd given that she was sitting only just moments again. She lifted her hands up, and rubbed at her eyes, before giving her head a good shake, in order to regain her senses. What she would open her eyes to see, however, would certainly serve to startle her.

What stood just a few feet before her was the same ring she had just found only minutes ago. However, to say it had undergone an impressive size change would be an understatement. The intricate metal works of the steel band stretched far above her head now. Heck, she'd need one tall ladder just to reach the top of it!

"Woah... That's weird!" She laughed it off to herself, thinking the ring had just grown to an absurd height, and turned to continue her walk. It was not until then that she would realize what had truly happened. She was standing on the park bench still... With the rest of the park stretching out beyond her for miles upon miles. Blurred figures of simply enormous figures went about their business far off in the distance, all of which sized appropriately to be gods and goddesses in their own rights.

Vicky's mind started to race. Had she shrunk? If so, just how small had she gotten? What the hell did that ring do to her? With her heart beating faster, in a state of panic, she looked around for some sort of answer. While she wouldn't very much like the sight she saw, she was completely awestruck.

Looming far ahead and above the ring, and, in effect Vicky, was the same wolfess she had sat down next to before. Absorbed still in her reading, the wolfess was a terrifying sight to Vicky. She had to be over a mile tall!

Vicky gulped, and set her vision back down to the ring. It seemed like she had two choices now, given that the plunge off the bench would be outright suicide. She could risk the ring again, and attempt to reverse the effects... Or she could try and get the wolfess' attention, however impossible that may seem.

After a small amount of thought, she decided to....
132321.title: Vicky is now the size of a flea!

choices: She goes from flea sized to Skyscraper sized
The ring somehow changed someone else
1323211.content:
After a small amount of thought, she decided to
Continue to tamper with the ring.

Surely if the ring caused this somehow then it can
fix it right?

After messing with the oversized ring more

_______

Vicky realizes that the Wolf girl has vanished.

She looks down to see what was now sitting exactly where the Wolf girl had been...
132322.title: The Wolf girl has disappeared, but it seems she...

choices: A white-furred little bunny girl with a butterfly net, looking fo her daddy.
Another cupcake? She can't carry more than two at once...
1323222.content:
Vicky picked the cupcake up from the bench. Did the wolf girl have a cupcake with her? She couldn't remember. It seems the girl had left her book and glasses too. The glasses were even placed on the cupcake itself! And Vicky though she was a dope sometimes! Vicky took the glasses off the cupcake and put them beside the book. The Girl would probably come back for those. The cupcake, on the other hand, wouldn't last very long on its own. Vicky could take care of that! She examined the cupcake further. It looked like chocolate with grey icing. Funny, it looked like the exact same shade as the wolf girl's fur. What a coincidence!

Vicky, not wanting to forget as usual, put her new ring on her finger. There was another blinding flash. Was it lightning? There were no clouds. Vicky shrugged it off and continued to walk through the park with her cupcake.

Speaking of which, Vicky noticed another cupcake on the ground! This one had white icing and it smelled like... carrot! Vicky wasn't too fond of carrot, but she picked it up anyways. She noticed that there was a butterfly net next to the cupcake. What was with people leaving their stuff around today?

Vicky heard someone walk up behind her, so she turned to see who it was.
1323222.title: The Cupcake Ring

choices: Something feels wrong and she stops.
13232221.content:
"Excuse me! Have you seen my daddy?"

Vicky turned around to see a little bunny girl in an orange dress. She looked to be about 6 or 7 years old and had white fur. She was carrying a butterfly net and was looking worried. She pointed at the butterfly net on the ground.

"That's his! Is he around here somewhere?"

Vicky couldn't leave this girl unattended! She turned to her.

"He'll probably come back here looking for you. Why don't you sit down and wait?"

Vicky took the little girl over to a bench and sat down beside her. She looked like she needed some cheering up, so Vicky handed her the cupcake she had just found.

"Here! This will make you feel better!"

The girl thanked Vicky and looked at the cupcake. She slowly peeled back the wrapper and gave it a sniff. Carrot. He dad loved carrot. She stuck her finger into the fresh, white icing. It was the same colour as her father's snowy fur, but the girl took no notice. She was too worried about where her dad was. She licked the bit of icing off the tip of her finger with her little pink tongue. It tasted sweet. She peeled more of the wrapper back, exposing a large portion of the cupcake. Something didn't seem right. She could feel it. Maybe she was just imagining things. She opened her mouth wide, exposing her large front teeth. She pulled it closer and closer, ready to take the first bite out of this delicious cupcake.

13233.content:
"Wow," said Vicky to herself, "This is, like, a really tiny and detailed toy! I think I'll take it home for, like, a closer look or something!"

Vicky brought the one centimetre bus close to her face for inspection and said to herself, "The details really are, like, totally amazing on such a small model! It must have taken a lot of hard work to make this!"

Suddenly, Vicky noticed something...
13233.title: "This toy bus is really tiny... is it, like...

choices: Vicky decides to head somewhere else in the city
Vicky gets noticed by one of the cops
132331.content:
Unbeknownst to the husky, the bus was actually a little closer to 22 centimeters long; but still, intricately designed down to the tiniest, almost unnoticeable detail. The husky giggled as she noticed that little ads were printed along the side of the vehicle, just like on a real bus! The whole thing reminded her of the toys she used to play with as a pup… but as she flipped it around in her hands, she heard something rattling around inside. She brought it up to her ears, shaking it curiously. Yep, there was definitely something inside. “Oooh! Sounds like there’s a little somethin’ extra!” She smiles, her ears perking up in excitement as she pries off the top of the bus with her claws. What could possibly be hidden away inside, she wondered?

She finally pulled the roof straight off the bus, and bent over on her hands and knees, peeking inside with an eye. As her eyes adjusted, she realized that the bus’ seats were full of little mouse people, each about two centimeters tall, all looking frightened and disheveled after she had shaken the tiny bus so fiercely. Her heart sank as she remembered the warnings that had been going around the neighborhood a few days prior. This was a tour bus! The mice people had been taking these buses all around the city, and the police had strictly demanded that the larger anthros do not interfere. “Oh, no… I’m sorry, little guys…” She frowned, holding the bus up once again as she looked sadly down on its terrified passengers. “Did I ruin your tour?”

She was tempted to just put the bus back down and pretend it never happened… but she couldn’t just do that! She had to make it up to them somehow! She rubbed her chin with her other paw for a few moments, pondering, until an idea struck her. “Oh! I know!” She smiled, her ears perking up and her tail wagging with excitement. “I could give you guys a tour! I could show you around way faster than this dingy ol’ bus ever could!” The mice seem horrified by the idea of being carried around any longer, but their protests go unheard by the dim-witted husky, too busy excitedly coming up with ideas for her ‘tour’. She could show them around the museum, or take them to the beach, or, or…

She decided to just start with the park. She carried the bus-full of mice around and she continued her job, giving completely nonsensical descriptions of everything she sees. “And over there, we have... a duck! There are tons of those, like, pretty much all over the place,” she says, pointing excitedly, putting on her best ‘tour guide’ voice. “Oh! And there, we have our park’s famous statue! I don’t know who it’s of, but… it looks pretty cool!" Meanwhile, the captive mice try to ignore the husky’s booming voice, hoping that she eventually gets bored and puts them down. The entire trip, the driver of the tiny bus speaks breathlessly into his radio, reporting their predicament and calling for help.

Around the park, various guards and police officers are notified that a mice tour bus has been taken captive in the area, and instantly jump into action, questioning everybody they see. Meanwhile, Vicky’s just about to finish up her daily jog...
132331.title: Tour Bus

choices: Hike up a hill for the best view of the entire city
1323312.content:
Just as she was about to finish up her job, she notices one of the various police officers in the park walking her way. Her heart instantly leaps in her chest, remembering that she technically wasn’t supposed to be interfering with the mice’s tour. She nervously hides the bus behind her as she turns to face the officer, though she’s not very subtle. “There is no need to be alarmed, but about a dozen mice have gone missing in this park recently,” the police officer, a muscular hyena, calmly questions. “You wouldn’t happen to know anything about that, would you?”

“... no,” she lies, obviously nervous.

The hyena almost immediately notices that the husky was trying to hide something behind her back. “Hey! What are you trying to hide?”

“... n-nothing!” She insisted, nervously. She hoped it wouldn’t come to this, but it seemed like she didn’t have any choice. Without moving her arms, she quickly hid the entire bus down the back of her tight briefs, instantly pressing the bus against her toaned ass. Most of the mice clung to their seats for dear life; the bus driver, however, had been standing up at the time, and was accidentally sent flying. The husky was too distracted to even notice one of the mice slipping between her furry cheeks, not even able to feel his tiny struggles. The other mice could only watch in horror as the bus driver, and in turn, his radio, was swallowed up by the husky’s voluptuous rear. Their only chance of escape was now gone. They were helpless.

The cop crosses his arms, thinking he has her dead to rights. “Show me your hands,” he demands, only to be surprised then the husky reaches her hands out in front of her, revealing them to be empty. “And your pockets.” Vicky rubs the sides of her sweat pants, pointing out her complete lack of pockets. The hyena grimaces, realizing he’s reached a dead end. “Hm. Well, have a nice day, ma’am.”

“Y-you too,” she said, nervously, before sighing in relief as the hyena wanders past to interrogate somewhere else. She quickly walks off to somewhere private, grinding the bus, still full of passengers, between her thick thighs as she walks. Finally, she hides behind one of the restrooms on the edge of the park, and finally pulls the bus from her sweat shorts. “Phew. Sorry about that, little guys. That must’ve been sorta gross,” she giggles, cradling the bus like a doll. The mice inside were now terrified beyond belief, but they were too small for her to notice. “I’m not really, like, supposed to be giving you this tour. But I’m not gonna let that stop us!” She smiles, wagging her tail as her excitement returns. “This is going to be the best tour ever!”

But first, she needs to find a way to hide them. She rubs her chin, pondering her situation. She didn’t have any bags or pockets, and even if she did, the bus would be way too big to effectively hide in any of them. Eventually, she decides to just get ditch the bus altogether. It was totally busted up, anyway, since she tore the roof off. The mice themselves would be much easier to hide. “But first, let me put you somewhere a little more… comfortable,” she smiles, giggling at the concept of hiding the mice with her impressive bust. She reaches into the bus and grab the tiny mice one by one, ten in all, tucking them into the front of her ill-fitting bra so that her cute little heads remain poking out the collar of her shirt.

The mice were miserable as they were pressed tightly against her perky breasts, clinging to her shirt for dear life, afraid they might fall deeper and meet a similar fate to their driver. The husky herself, on the other hand, was gleefully skipping around town, leaving the tour bus far behind her. She certainly made better time than the bus did; within a half hour, she had shown the mice every single thing of interest within a half-mile interest, even though the nauseated rodents had long ago stopped listening to the canine’s ramblings. Eventually, even the husky grew tired of sprinting all around town. At this rate, it would take them weeks before they reached anything truly interesting, and she was desperate to show them one of her favorite spots...
1323312.title: Guided Tour

13233122.content:
The remaining ten mice tucked away inside the husky’s tight shirt chattered amongst themselves, their tiny voices unheard by the oblivious canine, as she hiked up the mountain trail with natural ease. Their bus driver was probably still stuck somewhere in the dark, warm, sweaty valley between Vicky’s athletic cheeks. He had gone completely unnoticed by the canine, and the mice could only hope that he was okay back there. In the meantime, all they could do was ride it out and hope the rest of the husky’s ‘tour’ goes smoothly. “Wow. Y’all see that?” Vicky said upon reaching the top of the hill, watching out over the expansive cityscape that stretched from horizon to horizon below. “This is the most beautiful view of the city, right here…” The mice were actually beginning to enjoy themselves as they looked out over the spectacular view, awed by the sheer size of the city. Their regular tour guides never showed them places like this.

It was about lunchtime, so Vicky decided the adorable little mice should have a picnic right on top of the hill. She freed them from the confines of her bra, setting them down on a patch of dirt with an amazing view of the city. Although she only had a single energy bar to spare, the rodent people were so tiny, they were able to easily divide it up between themselves. Vicky sat down by them as they relaxed on the hilltop, giggling as she watched the tiny, doll-like people have their feast. The rodents were beginning to enjoy their tour at this point, and were charmed by the husky as she told them stories of her misadventures around town. After their picnic dragged on for a while, though, Vicky noticed a ticket that seemed to have fallen out of one of the mouse’s pocket. “Oh! What’s this?” She smiled, curiously. The mice didn’t seem to be able to speak loud enough for her to hear, so she enjoyed any possibility of communication.

She had to squint to read it, but from what she could tell, it was some kind of ticket for the tour the mouse were supposed to be taking. She first noticed, in a particularly big font, the text ‘3 DAY TOUR’. “You guys are on a three day tour?” She smiled, her tail wagging as she was filled with excitement, which ended up knocking some of the mice off their balance. Apparently, the little tour they were taking needed three days just to make it a couple miles… but with your size, you could show them all the coolest spots in the entire city in that time! As she watched the mice finish their meal, her mind raced as she tried to come up with a plan on how to fill the three days with as much stuff as possible.

By the time they finally finished with their little ‘picnic’, the husky was eager to get moving. “Alright guys, let’s get moving,” she said, tucking the mice one-by-one into her bra once again; they didn’t seem to resist much this time, and in fact, some of the males seemed positively eager. She giggled, glad that they were getting comfortable tucked away beneath her tight shirt. Satisfied, the husky jogged down the hill again, a plan already half-formed in her mind. Today, she’d stop by a few interesting vistas, stop for dinner, see a few things along the coast, and be home by sundown. She giggled at the idea of making the mice little beds out of napkins… but she’d cross that bridge when she came to it. First thing’s first; it was time to visit...
13233122.title: A Plan Forms

The husky thought it would be a nice idea to stick it down the back of her pants. She looks around for a bit before he pulls the back of her shorts and starts to lower the tiny bus into the back of her tight and tiny shorts...

Unknown to the klutzy husky, a tiny fox happens to be on the bus just before it was shrunk down to it's toy size and left out in the middle of the park.
Just as the tiny fox was starting to regain his consciousness he notices a big husky girl starting to lower the bus into the back of her shorts. The fox on board tries to get the klutzy husky's attention, but it was far too late and the bus ends up sliding in between her toned butt cheeks...

Inside the back of the husky's shorts, the trapped fox would cover his nose as the smell of sweat and other unpleasant odors filled the stuck bus as the husky straightens out her shorts and starts to walk again towards her home while the bus grinds up against the inner walls of the butt cheeks...

Meanwhile, the bus with the trapped fox inside of it...

133.content:
Vicky stretched up, standing on her toes as she reached towards the ceiling, letting out a happy little rumble into the air as she worked out a few kinks in her back, spine popping loudly several times before she dropped back onto the flat of her foot. She remembered what day it was immediately, curled tail beginning to wag behind her rear, she was going to the pool, something she rarely got to do, but she was determined to go today.

She grabbed out her bikini, bright red top and bottoms, quickly pulling them on, not even minding the few little pinches as her fur gets caught and tugged, or the extra tight grip of the clothing on her large bosoms and broad hips. The bikini was slightly too small, but nothing major for the dog, keeping her decency even if her bikini did hug up between her butt cheeks a bit much. She pulled on a pair of shorts and a t-shit over before grabbing a duffel bag, stuffing a few towels and a fresh change of underwear into it before she headed out of the house.

She slung the duffel bag over her shoulder and she padded down to the end of her street bare footed, stopping at the bus stop at the end as she just waited.
133.title: Going for a swim

choices: She heads off to some remote area
1331.content:
Vicky smiles to herself as she steps out of the bus, feeling the warm breeze washing over her trim body, the dog staring out across the beach ahead of her. It was a nice warm morning but it was still rather early, likely to get hotter as time went on, so it was likely going to be too much for Vicky after awhile. She knew she'd probably spend most of the time in the water though, her favourite way to stay cold at the beaach.

She pulls her duffel bag in agains her side, padding down the short case of stone stairs onto the warm sand and began to look around for a place to set her towel.
1331.title: Going to the beach

13311.content:
Vicky pouted slightly, tail giving an annoyed twitch behind her toned ass as she looked out across the beach ahead of her. It seems a lot of other people wanted to take advantage of the warm day in the summer, dozens of furs, scalies and even birds were scattered out across the golden sands. There were so many different speices Vicky could barely believe it, from short mouse girls and birds to looming whales, crocodiles and equines.

She glanced out across the beach as she tried to look for spots that could fit her in, and could only see about four of them. One was next to an Orca, the looming female was just over 20 feet tall. The next was beside a tall equine, the toned, muscular female clydesdale was near amazonian at around 18 feet and powerful looking. Another was beside a short mouse girl, but she wasn't like many mice Vicky had seen, she was busty and wide hipped, like a super model instead of flat chested and short like many in her species. She was even taller than many mice at 5 foot 4 inches. The final space was possibly the most dangerous, but it was also the biggest space, for good reason. The space was beside an amazonian crocodile woman, about 18 foot tall, toned and lean, definitely a powerful and dangerous predator.
13311.title: The beach is crowded

133112.content: Which one would you like?
133112.title: Mouse/Crocodile

choices: The gator grabs the husky in her maw
The gator decides to try out this whole 'friend' thing
1331122.content:
Vicky frowned when you realized that, despite the fact that the rest of the beach was incredibly crowded, there was a huge, empty space surrounding a large gator woman who was just innocently sunbathing on the shore. Alligators, bears, orcas and such always tend to get stereotypes as dangerous predators… but Vicky tries not to judge people based on just their species! The husky had made friends with plenty of suspected ‘predators’ that turned out to be some of the nicest people she’s ever met. Besides, the gator woman looked so lonely, just lying there by herself. Nobody should have to be lonely on the beach! Some places are just sacred! Thus, the husky comfortably set down her towel on the sand a few meters away from the giant alligator, without a moment of hesitation. A few of the other beach-goers stared at her and muttered to eachother, as if wondering how she could be so daring.

While she tried to mind her own business, she couldn’t help but take a glance at the alligator woman every once in awhile. It was rare that she got so close to an anthro so big. She noticed that the huge reptile seemed to be sunbathing topless, and her breasts, pressed against the sand, looked to bigger than the canine’s entire body. Vicky wondered why an alligator would ever bother sunbathing, until she realized the woman is probably cold blooded. Maybe she’s just warming up? As the husky got ready to take a dip in the beautiful pacific ocean, the alligator suddenly muttered something over her shoulder. “You’re in my spot,” the reptile growled over her shoulder, not bothering to open her eyes or even move a muscle.

“Uh… actually, I’m all the way over here,” the husky smiled, thinking that there had just been a misunderstanding.

The alligator woman groaned, having to put up with another moronic beachgoer. “No, I mean…” She said, holding out an arm, still not bothering to open her eyes. “You’re in MY spot.” The alligator gestured to the sand all around her, and Vicky realized that she was trying to claim a whole swathe of the beach.

“What? You can’t call dibs on, like, the whole beach!” Vicky said, indignantly.

The alligator slowly turned her massive head, her huge, yellow, reptilian eye staring daggers at her. “You’re not very bright, are you, runt?” She growls, looking like a formidable godzilla as she loomed over the canine. She showed her huge maw to the husky, pointing at the dark tunnel of her throat with a claw. “You either get OUT of my spot, or you’re going to end up IN here. Your choice.” Vicky was a little intimidated by the view down the gator’s throat, but she maintained her composure. The alligator was probably just bitter about how she’s been treated in the past, and just wanted to be left alone. But… Vicky still believed that they could be friends! She just had to be persistent!

“Y-you wouldn’t eat me,” the husky shook her head, the nervousness apparent in her voice.

The huge gator woman cackled. “What makes you so sure?”

Vicky sighed, choosing her words carefully. “Because… I think you’re a good person,” she said, staring at her paws, shivering with fear as the reptile towered over here. “A-and… you wouldn’t want to hurt anybody.” Vicky flinched as the gator lifted up her chin with a claw, but remained dedicated. “And I think we could be friends!” She yelled passionately, finishing her speech. The alligator woman raised a brow, taken aback by the canine’s response. She had never met somebody so brave… and/or stupid.

“Interesting theories you have there,” the alligator smirked, smiling a big, toothy smile, showing her rows of huge, sharp teeth. “Wanna test them out?”
1331122.title: Amazonian Gator

choices: They get intercepted by a sea creature
13311222.content:
The husky’s optimistic assumption of her good will was, of course, laughably false. It’s no secret that a number of anthros have passed through the gator woman’s digestive tract over the years; this was normal for predators of her stature, after all. While it’s nominally illegal, as long as she only eats someone occasionally, the authorities look the other way, knowing that trying to take down a predator of her size would only result in extensive casualties. Indeed, the gator could just gulp the ditzy little husky down right this very moment, and nobody else on the beach would dare to interfere. Indeed, she imagined the canine’s curvy, voluptuous figure would make for a fulfilling snack… however, the gator couldn’t help but be intrigued by the brave teenager. Nobody had ever stood up to her like this for as long as she could remember, much less tried to call her out on her ‘bluff’. Perhaps this little mutt would be more entertaining alive… “Alright, dog. Let’s be ‘friends’,” she smirked, reaching out and gently picking up the husky by the waist with her huge, clawed hand.

“W-whoa! What are you doing?” The husky wriggled around in her grasp as the gator woman slowly climbed to her feet, soon towering over the rest of the crowd, not bothering to put her top back on, letting her huge, scaly breasts loom over every anthro on the beach. For the spectators, it was a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to witness a rack of such impossible proportions; most were distracted, though, by the terrifying event that was unfolding. They were sure that poor canine woman was about to get eaten, right before their eyes! The beachgoers collectively held their breaths as the reptile lifted Vicky up to eye-level.

“Just taking you along for a swim,” the gator teased, her tone making it obvious she was mocking the husky’s naivety. “We are ‘friends’, after all, aren’t we?” The gator woman gave Vicky a good look down her cavernous throat, making it obvious what would happen to her if she declined.

“... yes, we’re friends,” Vicky said, trying to hide her fear, as she was starting to regret this whole thing. She squirmed a bit in the gator’s grip; she was being held up around two stories in the air, and with her fear of heights, she wasn’t quite enjoying it. The gator cackled sadistically, seeing the helpless canine’s discomfort.

“Well, fantastic, then. Hold on!” The reptile clutched Vicky tightly against her soft bust as she braced herself; and suddenly, without warning, the gator began sprinting towards the water. “Cannonball!” The swimmers in the ocean before her tried desperately to swim out of the way, but a few slow or unlucky anthros ended up getting caught beneath the huge woman as she descended into the water. Luckily, the water was deep enough that they weren’t injured, but a couple were pinned underwater by the gator’s huge bikini-clad ass, pressing them into the sand. The gator woman didn’t even notice them, so entertained by the horrified look on the husky’s face as the two of them plummeted into the ocean at terrifying speeds. “Wew! Wasn’t that fun?” She teased the canine.

Vicky was panting, her heart still beating rapidly in her chest. She didn’t expect the gator to run that fast, nor did she expect the jump to feel like she was falling to her doom. Still, she had more pressing concerns. “... those… people…” She eventually managed to choke out between pants. “... you… landed on them…”

The gator was confused for a moment, but when she concentrated, she realized she could indeed feel a couple anthros pressed beneath her rear. “Whoops! Silly me!” She cackled, scooting over, reaching deep underwater and picking the anthros up from where she was once sitting. They didn’t seem to be permanently injured, but they had been knocked out by the lack of oxygen. “Aw, poor things. These silly little anthros never seem to have any sense of self preservation…” She teased Vicky, as she dangled the two unconscious anthros up in front of her face. “Hm… they look like they’d make a great snack, though,” she said, just to see Vicky’s horrified reaction.

“N-no!” The husky yelled out instinctively, despite her lack of breath.

“No?” The alligator replied, feigning surprise. “Well, a gal’s gotta eat somethin’. I guess we can go out to a restaurant, but only the most premium buffets can fill this belly…” She gestured to her large, toned stomach, which was covered in slightly lighter scales than the rest of this body. “What, are you offering to pay?” Vicky saw where this was going. She was already having some trouble financially, trying to get her foot in the door in a place like this. She definitely couldn’t afford some fancy buffet… but the gator might eat these innocent people if she declines…

“Fine...” Vicky sighs.

“Thank you! You’re such a good friend,” the gator cackled, taunting the husky. She leans back, holding her arm out just far enough to drop the unconscious anthros gently on the beach. A few beachgoers rushed over to resuscitate them while the gator swam out into deeper waters. “There’s actually a nice little place right on the beach near here. We don’t even have to leave the water!” The gator had the canine ride on her shoulder as she swam parallel with the shore, travelling around 20 mph with ease. During the quiet time, Vicky wondered what she ever did to deserve all this. It almost seemed like the gator was seeing how far she could push the canine before she broke. Still, she had to be strong. Maybe, with enough patience and willpower, she could break through to the emotionally stunted reptile… or maybe she’d die trying...
13311222.title: Unsteady "Friendship"

choices: It appears to be a normal beach.
A children's sandbox after a rain.
1333.content:
Vicky stepped on the bus. She looked around and realized that there was nobody on it. She didn't pay it any mind (like she had one anyway), and sat down in a seat. She dozed off and fell fast asleep.

Little did she know that the bus was not supposed to be ridden. In fact, there were several warning signs that said not to enter. Vicky was too excited about going to the beach that she didn't even notice them. The bus was to be subject to a matter teleportation experiment (I guess) and soon it was transported.

Vicky wakes up on the bus. Looking out her window, she can see what looks like a beach. She rushes out of the bus and runs to the shore. This beach looks feels different, but she doesn't care.

What is this 'beach'?
1333.title: Accidentally takes the wrong bus, gets lost

Oh well, at least she has the beach to herself and with that, she takes couple of steps on the sand of the beach.

Her paws feeling the smooth surface on the sand and that she still feels weird about this place since no one was in sight. It is too bad for Vicky that furs are actually there and that this beach she wasn't suppose to be on is a...

151.content: Vicky had a ton of errands to get done and, unfortunately, time was a problem! Oh, sure, the night wasn't all that bad... Unless, of course, you weren't a predator. As soon as the sun went down, the predators took over the city! Sure, Vicky was a dog (and, therefore, kind of like a predator), but she didn't want to take any chances. She made a mad dash to get her errands done...
151.title: Terror time, once again!

152.content:
Vicky scratched gently behind her right ear, raking her blunt hand claws through the thick fur there, working out a few tangles before finally started to move again. She grabbed on a pair of white cotton panties and a matching bra before tugging on a baggy pair of green cargoes, a tight fitting white T-shirt and a pair of trainers. She strolls down the stairs then, letting out a quiet yawn into the air.

She didn't really know what she wanted to do today, it was the weekend and she hadn't planned anything with her friends, so it was just time to wait around and see what happened. She didn't want to go out for a walk today, not with the amount of dragon-related crime that had sprung up recently, a few furs had disappeared, a few had been found shrunken and left that way, some furs had even been found in macro sized footprints. Dragons were dangerous, all the regular people of the world knew it, they were uncontrollable, and with the powers to basically do anything they wanted, they were unaccountable for their crimes. They had nearly ruled the world for hundreds of years, most didn't hold government or any real positions of power, but regular people knew that if a dragon wanted something, it was best to do it and just pray to not be picked on.

Vicky pushed the thoughts from her height, she didn't like to think about dragons much anymore, she just wanted to relax today. She padded down into the kitchen, pulling open the fridge door, when suddenly.
152.title: Dragon Rulers

info.brief_description: Follow the life of an unlucky husky as she has to deal with TF, growth, shrinking, etc.
info.description:
Follow our heroine, a ditzy Husky girl forced to endure one hell of a time as her life takes unique twists because of transformation, shrinking, growth and many other unfortunate events. She could end up winning because of it, but most likely will end up on the receiving end.

Her name is Victoria. She's a husky girl, six feet and four inches tall, a very athletic girl who's never been gifted with much intelligence but she's a very beautiful girl, and very sporty too. Her fur is red on her back, fading to grey and then to white across her torso, inner arms and legs.

Have fun with the story, feel free to put Vicky through anything, from helping her win to punishing her with whatever you can think off.

I'm pretty much open to most things but please try and not going into weight or muscle gain, never liked that much.
